Glendale.Grand View Memorial Park Cemetery:
Grand View Memorial Park Cemetery at 1341 Glenwood Road in Glendale, Los Angeles County, California, United States, was established in 1884 as Glendale Cemetery.
The cemetery was purchased by Len C. Davis in the 1920s, renamed Grand View Memorial Park, and extensively remodeled. A forty-foot entrance arch was added on what is now Glenwood Road.
